program combined

  implicit none

  character(len=100) :: input_str, intermediate_str, S
  integer :: dot_pos, i, N, mod_arr(0:99), mod_cnt(0:2018), tmp, radix, ans
  integer :: integer_value, decimal_digit
  character :: before_dot, decimal_digit_char

  ! First step processing
  read(*,'(A)') input_str

  ! Find the position of '.' in input_str
  dot_pos = 0
  do i = 1, len_trim(input_str)
     if (input_str(i:i) == '.') then
        dot_pos = i
        exit
     end if
  end do

  before_dot = input_str(dot_pos-1:dot_pos-1)
  if (before_dot == '9') then
     intermediate_str = "GOTO Vasilisa."
  else
     decimal_digit_char = input_str(dot_pos+1:dot_pos+1)
     decimal_digit = ichar(decimal_digit_char) - ichar('0')
     if (decimal_digit >4) then
        ! Increment the integer part
        integer_part_str = input_str(1:dot_pos-1)
        read(integer_part_str,*) integer_value
        integer_value = integer_value +1
        write(intermediate_str, '(I0)') integer_value
     else
        intermediate_str = input_str(1:dot_pos-1)
     end if
  end if

  ! Second step processing
  S = trim(intermediate_str)
  N = len_trim(S)
  mod_arr = 0
  mod_cnt = 0
  radix = 1
  ans = 0

  do i = 0, N-1
     ! Get the character at position N - i (since S is 1-based)
     integer :: current_char_pos = N - i
     character :: current_char = S(current_char_pos:current_char_pos)
     integer :: digit = ichar(current_char) - ichar('0')

     tmp = mod(digit * radix, 2019)
     if (i > 0) then
        tmp = mod(tmp + mod_arr(i-1), 2019)
     end if
     mod_arr(i) = tmp
     mod_cnt(tmp) = mod_cnt(tmp) + 1
     radix = mod(radix * 10, 2019)
  end do

  ! Add the initial 0
  mod_cnt(0) = mod_cnt(0) + 1

  ! Compute the answer
  ans = 0
  do i = 0, 2018
     ans = ans + mod_cnt(i) * (mod_cnt(i) -1) / 2
  end do

  ! Output the answer
  print*, ans

end program combined
